edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.processors

Class ObjectManipulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsc.cross.hse.core.processors.ObjectManipulator

  • public class ObjectManipulator
extends java.lang.Object
    A global pointer management system that allows the values of objects to be modified without overwriting the value. Intended Operator: System
